top_note: This estimate reflects minimum code-compliant restoration to pre-loss condition. Any reduction in scope may result in: Building code violations, Safety hazards, Future liability exposure, Incomplete restoration requiring additional claims. All pricing reflects competitive DMV market rates with supporting documentation available upon request.
bottom_note: O&P reflects industry standard project management, supervision, insurance, bonding, warranty obligations, and contractor profit margin required for multi-trade coordination. Per Xactimate standards and regional market rates, 20% O&P is standard for restoration projects involving multiple trades, code compliance coordination, and insurance claim management.
disclaimer:
CODE COMPLIANCE REFERENCES

IRC R502.3: Subfloor requirements and transitions
IRC R702.3: Drywall installation per manufacturer specifications
IRC R702.3.8: Joint treatment and surface preparation requirements
IRC R702.5: Continuous trim installation requirements
OSHA Standards: Worker safety and surface protection requirements
